summary: American Broadcasting Company (ABC) is an American TV and radio network owned by Disney. Headquartered in Burbank, California, it's known as the "Alphabet Network" since "ABC" starts the English alphabet. Launched in 1943 as a radio network, it expanded to television in 1948. ABC merged with United Paramount Theatres in the 1950s and later with Capital Cities/ABC in 1980s, eventually becoming part of Disney in 1996. Now, ABC has over 230 affiliated TV stations in the U.S. and its programming is also available in Canada.
title: American Broadcasting Company
